name: ELESION
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, set the light to green”
”Alexa, turn on the plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With ELESION, experience as fully as possible a perfectly connected home: your lights and other devices are now controllable by simple voice command. Just say your order for ELESION to execute.

Here is the step-by-step instructions:
1. Download our "ELESION" app in app market, then register an account (or log in directly if you already have an account);
2. Configure our devices in "ELESION" app and change appropriate name for your devices;
3. Enable "ELESION" skill on Alexa app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking;
4. Tell Echo "Alexa, discover my devices". Wait for Echo to say "Search complete";
5. Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Lighting :
- Alexa, turn on the light.
- Alexa, turn off the light.
- Alexa, dim the light.
- Alexa, increase the light.
- Alexa, set the light brightness to 20%.

Plug :
- Alexa, turn on the plug.
- Alexa, turn off the plug.
